value:
$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I like the Black Fang the way it used
to be. We believed in our own
righteousness.$k$pWe can't go back... Back to the good
old days.$k$p

$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Pray. I'll give you that much time. All
the evil that you've done up to now...
Repent it, and sleep.$k$p

$WmMPID_ウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Stupid child... I'll see that you don't
suffer at least.$k$p

$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I have no heart. I know nothing of joy,
sorrow, anger, dread... And yet, I am...$k$p

$WmMPID_ロイド,ch03_10_Lloyd_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Do not speak. We are enemies now...
I can show you no mercy. Kill me, and
don't look back.$k$p
